action.description: Do a handstand for at least 3 seconds
action.outcome: give out 4 sips if you succeed, drink 2 otherwise

action.description: Speak with a Russian accent until your next round

never have i ever.description: Never have I ever used a fake ID
never have i ever.outcome: Everyone that has will drink 2 times

never have i ever.description: Never have I ever puked in a cab
never have i ever.outcome: Everyone that has will drink 2 times

trivia.outcome: Drink 2 sips if you get it wrong

trivia.description: What is the Italian word for pie?
trivia.outcome: give out 2 sips if you succeed, drink 4 otherwise

trivia.description: What Is It Called When A Bottle Of Champagne Is Open With A Sword?
trivia.outcome: Drink 3 sips if you get it wrong

trivia.description: What Was The First Toy To Be Advertised On Television?
trivia.outcome: Drink 4 sips if you get it wrong
Drink your whole cup if you get it wrong

trivia.description: What’s The Total Number Of Dots On A Pair Of Dice?
trivia.outcome: Drink 1 sips if you get it wrong

trivia.description: How Many Valves Does A Trumpet Have?
trivia.outcome: Drink 4 sips if you get it wrong

trivia.description: Where Is The Bermuda Triangle Situated?
trivia.outcome: give out 2 sips if you succeed, drink 3 otherwise

trivia.description: How Do You Say “Merry Christmas” In Spanish?
trivia.outcome: Drink 2 sips if you get it wrong

trivia.description: How many legs does a spider have?
trivia.outcome: Drink 3 sips if you get it wrong

truth or dare.description: The player to your left should ask you a truth or dare
The player in front of you should ask you a truth or dare
